description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Handy Tips for buying high-speed rail tickets

2025-12-05T17:13:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that purchase your High Speed Rail tickets up to 15 days ahead of travel: 1. from the 12306 official website(12306. cn), mobile app or appointed travel agents (Click here). 2. in Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: ● Self-service Ticket Machines: bring valid and original travel documents of all passengers; only e-payment methods are accepted (for example, contactless credit cards, WeChat Pay or Alipay) ● Ticketing Counters: may require a longer waiting time.
2025-12-05T17:13:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，如需購買15天內的高速鐵路車票: 1.建議使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)、手機應用程式或透過指定代理購票(按此)。 2.如於香港西九龍站購票，可使用： ●自助售票機：需帶備所有乘車人士的有效旅遊證件正本；只接受電子支付（如感應式信用卡、微信支付或支付寶） ●票務櫃位：可能需要輪候較長時間
